name: Awas Ada Pocong
description:
Watchout for Pocong!

A simple game about surviving from pocongs attack. Defeat pocongs as many as possible, gather a lot of exp, and upgrade your hero skills.

Follow us on instagram: @wonten.studio

Subscribe to our channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH6-rZ4gBpK8N1XwJCcCi_Q
